attributes.action: Bring back National Service to restore our National Identity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is too much isolation between communities and the younger people of our country should be united at an early age, in a common goal, to engender improved inter-racial relations.

Enforce National Service For Young People

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
